user.title: Number of Wallets
user.description: Please enter the number of wallets, you would like to add. In the next step, you will be asked about the wallet addresses one by one.

wallets.title: Solana Wallet Address
wallets.description: You can find this address in your Helium App (black icon) > Settings > Copy Address > Solana. After successful setup, once reloading the integration or restarting Home Assistant is needed.
